author: stsp
msg: (diff_repos_wc_file_target): Fold an inner non-conditional scope into its
parent scope. No functional change, just moving variable declarations and

author: simonw
msg: LUCENE-2878: add position iterator support to PhraseQuery (except of Sloppy)

author: stsp
msg: Optimise 'svn diff -rN:BASE TARGET' in the case where TARGET is a file
which is sitting in the BASE tree.
(diff_repos_wc_file_target): Drop DIFF_WITH_BASE parameter and related code.
That case is now handled outside of this function.
(diff_repos_wc): If diffing the repository version of a file against the
BASE version, fall through to using the diff editor instead of calling
diff_repos_wc_file_target(). The editor will do the right thing and maybe
transfer less data by sending deltas against BASE instead of fulltext.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-2357 (4.x backport): use packed ints to hold docID remapping during merging, to reduce transient RAM usage

author: jasha
msg: Split up profile edit & revert stories to show changes persist between sessions
